game.name: MIO: Memories in Orbit
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Keyboard Only Option, Stereo Sound, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 이 매혹적인 메트로배니아에서 안드로이드 MIO가 되어 제멋대로인 기계가 가득한 거대한 최첨단 방주인 Vessel을 탐험하세요. Vessel의 비밀을 밝혀내고, MIO의 능력을 강화하고, 우주선과 주민을 망각으로부터 구하세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Play as android MIO in this mesmerizing metroidvania where you explore the Vessel, an enormous technological ark overgrown with machines gone rogue. Uncover its secrets, enhance MIO's abilities, and save the spaceship and its residents from oblivion.
